forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow this evening, becoming all snow overnight. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow this evening turning to all snow overnight. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a mixture of rain and snow in the morning. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning. Overcast in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low -1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early will become steadier snow overnight. Low 29F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. High around 0C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 12-20cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Temps nearly steady in the low to mid 30s. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 5 to 8 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will give way to lingering snow showers overnight. Low near 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. High 1C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. High 33F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers in the evening and steady snow likely after midnight. Low -2C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 27F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will taper to showers of rain and wet snow during the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning becoming mostly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow flurries and snow showers. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low around 30F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 41F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers developing after midnight. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional snow showers later during the night. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.
